title: How can I change the movement from the right click to left click?
body: My mouse button right isn t working anymore and I wanna make the left click button do what the right click is doing and the right click what the left click is doing. Any help, please?{{champion:203}}

replies.body: Our recent patch gave an option to swap mouse clicks.  While in-game, select Hotkeys in the options menu and scroll all the way to to bottom!  This might help in the meantime, but it may be a good idea to look for another mouse!
